content: गल्लः The cheek; especially, the part of the cheek near the corners of the mouth. (Rhetoricians consider this word to be ग्राम्य or vulgar; <ab>cf.</ab> the instance given in <ls>K. P. 7</ls>: --तांबूलभृतगल्लोयं भल्लं जल्पति मानुषः; but <ab>cf.</ab> Bhavabhūti's use: --पातालप्रतिमल्लगल्लविवरप्रक्षिप्तसप्तार्णवं <ls>Māl. 5. 22</ls>).
